name: Young Silver Dragon
senses: blindsight 30 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 17

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dragon attacks with its bite and twice with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) cold damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) slashing damage.

actions.name: Breath Weapons (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons:

actions.name: Frost Breath
actions.desc: The dragon exhales freezing wind in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in the area makes a DC 17 Constitution saving throw  taking 40 (9d8) cold damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

actions.name: Paralyzing Breath
actions.desc: The dragon exhales paralytic gas in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in the area must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed until the end of its next turn.

special_abilities.name: Cloud Strider
special_abilities.desc: The dragon suffers no harmful effects from high altitudes.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc: The dragons spellcasting ability is Charisma (save DC 17). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components. 3/day each:charm person, faerie fire
